comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Sea Bright is a borough of Monmouth County, New Jersey. This photo shows wreckage after a series of storms on December 26, 1913, and January 3, 4, and 5, 1914.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for the information, Wystan. We'll make the changes to the group of records the next time we update them.
